attributes.action: A clear stance against any 'vaccine pass' for attending University.
attributes.additional_details: I believe it will create a two tiered society. I do not think it allows people to be equal and it worries me for the future of not only university education but also further down into younger schooling. There is simply not enough data on the vaccine to completely ensure it is safe. I therefore believe it is reprehensible to then make that a condition of gaining an education.
attributes.background: Make it clear that there will be no Vaccine pass and no requirement to show vaccine status for attending lectures or staying in halls.
